title: vaDivazhagai solli
sahitya:
vaDivazhagai solli muDivadillai aruL vaLLal guNALan vaLLi maNALan


anupallavi

  toDarvinai tIrkkum tirukkaiyilE shakti shuDar viDum vElum irukkaiyilE anda


caraNam    vaNNat-tamizh pazhagum vAi azhagum karuNai taNNumudozhugum kaNNazhagum anbar
uNNat-teviTTAda meyyazhagum avarkku udaviDum IrAru kai azhagum vAinda
